definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: It is audacious, disruptive and preposterous on the face of it.
sentences.chinese: 表面看來，其膽大妄爲，且顛覆常理，又荒誕可笑。

sentences.english: Suicide, under certain circumstances, might be rationally and morally justified.
sentences.chinese: 自殺有時候，也有可能是合乎常理的。

sentences.english: A paradox it may be, but this was not an accident or a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 這種體制安排或許有悖於常理，但既非偶然亦非錯誤。

sentences.english: The common base is that implementations must be able to unmarshal valid documents.
sentences.chinese: 根據常理，實現必須能夠反編組有效的文檔。

sentences.english: "In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous. " — Elsa Schiaparelli.
sentences.chinese: 在每個困難的時代，時尚都是不合常理的。

sentences.english: Therefore, aesthetic concept of the General Sense theory means the concept expressed in drawings.
sentences.chinese: 因此，“常理”說的美學理念是“寓意於畫”。

sentences.english: Trodden the dusty road of common sense.
sentences.chinese: 整日行走在積塵的常理之道。

sentences.english: And using common sense is beyond them?
sentences.chinese: 他們就不能夠用用常理思考嗎？

sentences.english: I am floating beyond certainty and being romanced by forces with secret motives.
sentences.chinese: 我遊浮於常理之外，並深爲神祕的驅動力所傾迷。

sentences.english: The commonsensical to do is to cut spending, but nobody wants to cut spending.
sentences.chinese: 減少開支纔是符合常理的做法，但沒人願意這樣做。

sentences.english: Of all the sexual perversions, monogamy is the most unnatural.
sentences.chinese: 在所有對性的曲解中，一夫一妻制是最不合常理的。

definition: according to reason/in the ordinary course of events/normally
common sense/the way people usually feel about things
in the ordinary course of events/ordinarily/normally
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
lit. compass and set square/fig. established standard/rule/customs/practices/fig. upright and honest/well-behaved
